Architecture is the discipline that is concerned with the planning, designing and the overseeing of the construction of the built environment "

"Regional and urban planning is a discipline that ensures that the development of the built environment is economic, promotes social development, is aesthetically appealing and that it meets the needs of the community. "
A program that prepares individuals to manage, coordinates, and supervises the construction process from concept development through project completion on timely and economic bases. "

Real estate is a discipline concerned with the use, valuation, management and development of land and property within the built environment. It focuses on the legal, economic, sociological and technical factors which affect the ownership of land and property.
Animal science is the study of biology of animals that are under the control of human kind. It is the production and management of farm animals
A program that deals with the support of animals
A program that deals with the business aspect of agriculture and its operations

A program that generally prepares individuals to sell, select, and service agricultural or agribusiness technical equipment and facilities, including computers, specialized software, power units, machinery, equipment structures, and utilities. "

A program that focuses on the general planning, economics, and use of facilities, natural resources, equipment, labor, and capital to produce plant and animal products, and that may prepare individuals for work in farming, ranching, and agribusiness.
Click for more information on the Agriculture public services

A program that focuses on the general production and processing of domesticated plants, shrubs, flowers, foliage, trees, groundcovers, and related plant materials; the management of technical and business operations connected with horticultural services; and the basic scientific principles needed to understand plants and their management and care.

A program that focuses on the application of biological, chemical, and physical principles to the study of converting raw agricultural products into processed forms suitable for direct human consumption, and the storage of such products
Click for more information on the social sciences program

A program that focuses on the scientific study of the husbandry and production of non-domesticated fish and shellfish populations for recreational and commercial purposes and the management of fishing and marine/aquatic product processing to ensure adequate conservation and efficient utilization. It includes instruction in the principles of marine/aquatic biology, freshwater and saltwater ecosystems, water resources, fishing production operations and management, fishing policy and regulation, and the management of recreational and commercial fishing activities.
A program that prepares individuals to apply principles of forestry and natural resources management to the administration of forest lands and related resources. "
Click for more information on the natural resources conservation and research programs
Click for more information on the natural resources management and policy programs
Developed By Amos Banda and Ren Technology
Programs dealing with Agriculture, Natural Resources and Built Environments

There are a number of programs offered in the schools of engineering at most universities in the world. In Zambia, engineering is a five-years program, and mainly offered at the University of Zambia, Copperbelt University, and Mulungushi University. Specialization in the school of engineering may vary from one country to another.

There are many colleges and universities offering Information Communication Technology programs in Zambia. Majority of programs are offered at the University of Zambia School and Copperbelt University.

There are a number of science programs offered in the school of Natural sciences and mathematics. Mainly, the University of Zambia School of natural sciences, Copperbelt University School of natural sciences graduates a lot of scientists and mathematicians in this field
This explains engineering technologies and technicians programs offered in Technical Education, Vocational and Entrepreneurship Training Authority (TEVETA) affiliated institutions.
" Computer science is the study of computers and computer systems. It deals with software and software systems-this includes their theory, design, development and application. "

Computer engineering involves the design and development of systems based on computers and complex digital logic devices. It integrates electronics engineering and computer science to design and develop computer systems and other technological devices

"Agriculture extension is the discipline that deals with the application of scientific research and new knowledge to agricultural practices through farmer education. "

"Agricultural economics is the discipline that deals with the applied social sciences that deals with how producers, consumers and societies use scarce resources in the production, marketing, and consumption of food and fiber products. "
Click for more information on the wildlife and wild lands science and mangement

"A program that prepares individuals to practice the profession of accounting and to perform related business functions. Includes instruction in accounting principles and theory, financial accounting, managerial accounting, cost accounting, budget control, tax accounting, legal aspects of accounting, auditing, reporting procedures, statement analysis, planning and consulting, business information systems, accounting research methods, professional standards and ethics, and applications to specific for-profit, public, and non-profit organizations. "

"A program that prepares individuals to manage and/or administer the processes by which a firm or organization contracts for goods and services to support its operations, as well as contracts it to sell to other firms or organizations. "

"Human resource management is a discipline that deals with the process of employing people, training them, compensating them and developing policies relating to them and developing strategies to retain them. "
Banking and Finance is a discipline that deals with the structure and functioning of financial markets and the way in which financial intermediaries and institutions operate

"A program that prepares individuals to manage and/or administer the processes by which a firm or organization contracts for goods and services to support its operations, as well as contracts it to sell to other firms or organizations. "

"A program that prepares individuals to manage and direct the physical and/or technical functions of a firm or organization, particularly those relating to development, production, and manufacturing. "

"A program that prepares individuals to manage and coordinate all logistical functions in an enterprise, ranging from acquisitions to receiving and handling, through internal allocation of resources to operations units, to the handling and delivery of output. "

"Marketing is discipline that deals with the management process which determines which products or services are most of interests to customers, and which then develops and applies a marketing strategy to leverage those insights across sales channels, customer-facing communications, and business development process. "
"A program that generally prepares individuals to plan, organize, direct, and control the functions and processes of a firm or organization. "
"A program that generally prepares individuals to perform the duties of administrative assistants and/or secretaries and stenographers. "

"A program that prepares individuals for the independent professional practice of law, for taking state and national bar examinations, and for advanced research in jurisprudence. It includes instruction in the theory and practice of the legal system, including the statutory, administrative, and judicial components of civil and criminal law. "

A general program that focuses on the systematic study of the production, conservation and allocation of resources in conditions of scarcity, together with the organizational frameworks related to these processes

"Mass communication is a discipline concerned with the process of creating, sending, receiving, and analyzing messages to large audience’s vial verbal and written media. It is an expanse field that considers not only how and why a message is created but the medium through it is sent. "

"A program that prepares individuals for the professional practice of social welfare administration and counseling, and that focus on the study of organized means of providing basic support services for vulnerable individuals and groups. "
Psychology is a multifaceted discipline of study that is concerned with the study of human development, sports, health, clinical, social behavior and cognitive processes.

Statistics and demography are the study of human populations especially with references to size and density, distribution, and vital statistics such as births, deaths, immigration and emigration and a regular census of population to provide information that is key to making sound decision about national policy.

"Political science is a classical discipline that deals with the study of political phenomena. It deals with the system of governance and analysis of political activities, political thoughts associated with constitutions and political behavior. It encompasses economics, law, sociology, history, philosophy, human geography, journalism, political anthropology and social policy. "

"Community development is a practiced based profession and an academic discipline that promotes participative democracy, sustainable development, human rights, economic opportunities, equality and social justice, through the organization, education and empowerment of people within their communities. "
"Public Administration is a branch of political science dealing primarily with the structure and workings of agencies charged with the administrations of government functions. "

A program that is a structured combination of the arts, biological and physical sciences, social sciences, and humanities, emphasizing breadth of study. Includes instruction in independently designed, individualized, or regular programs.

" Civil Engineering is an engineering discipline that deals with the planning, designing, construction and maintenance of physical and naturally built environments including public works such as highways, transit systems, bridges, tunnels, shopping malls and complexes harbours"

" Mechanical engineering is a branch of engineering that combines engineering, physics and mathematics principles with material science to design, analyze, manufacture and maintain mechanical systems"
" Aeronautical Engineering deals with the development of aircraft and spacecraft that includes military aircraft design and development, along with commercial airline design and satellite technology"

ctrical and Electronics Engineering is an engineering discipline that deals with the generation, transmission and distribution of power in form of electrical, hydro and natural resources such as wind and solar energy to light our cities, our homes and our industries
A program that prepares individuals to apply mathematical principles to the determination of the location, elevations, and alignment of natural and man-made topographic features.
A program that prepares individuals to apply mathematical principles to the design, development, and maintenance of telecommunications technology, networks, and systems.
Railway engineering is a multifaceted engineering discipline that deals with the design, construction, and operation of all railway transport systems.
Mechatronics Engineering is a blend of mechanical engineering and electronics engineering for hybrid engineers.
A program that prepares individuals to apply mathematical principles to the problems associated with combining mechanical components with special emphasis on manufacturing and automated processes

hemical engineering is a multidisciplinary branch of engineering that combines natural and experimental sciences such as chemistry and physics along with life sciences such as biology, microbiology and biochemistry plus mathematics and economics

ining Engineering is a multidisciplinary branch of engineering that deals with the development and preparation of a mine in order to safely and efficiently extract resources while protecting the environment

A program that prepares individuals to apply geotechnical engineering methods, which deal with the analysis, design and construction of earth and earth supported structures, to the application of environmental problems, such as waste containment, waste disposal, and construction of landfills, soil permeation, soil analysis, and soil improvement.
Metallurgical Engineering is the branch of engineering that deals with mineral processing technologies and the adaptation of metals for various engineering applications.

Environmental Engineering is the discipline that deals with the development of processes and infrastructure for the supply of water, disposal of waste and the control of pollution of all kinds, protecting public health by preventing disease transmission and preserving the quality of the environment by averting contamination and degradation of air, water and land resources.

A program that prepares individuals to apply mathematical and geological principles to the analysis and evaluation of engineering problems, including the geological evaluation of construction sites, the analysis of geological forces acting on structures and systems, the analysis of potential natural resource recove

A general program that focuses on the scientific study of the composition and behaviour of matter, including its micro and macrostructures, the processes of chemical change, and the theoretical description and laboratory simulation of these phenomena

A program that prepares individuals to apply mathematical principles to the design, development and operational evaluation of materials, systems, and methods used to construct and equip buildings intended for human habitation or other purposes.

A program that prepares individuals to apply basic engineering principles and technical skills to support architects, engineers and planners engaged in designing and developing buildings, urban complexes, and related systems.

A program that prepares individuals to apply basic engineering principles and technical skills to support civil engineers engaged in designing and executing public works projects such as highways, dams, bridges, tunnels and other facilities.

A program that prepares individuals to apply basic engineering principles and technical skills to support engineers, engineering contractors and other professionals engaged in the construction of buildings and related structures.
he focus in this field of study is engineering
The focus of the field to study is technology
This focuses on the fields of mechanics and electronics
The focus of this study is vehicle maintenance and repair
"A general program that prepares individuals to apply scientific principles and technical skills in support of scientific research and development. "
A program that prepares individuals to apply technical knowledge and skills to fabricate and repair steam boiler components

A program that prepares individuals to apply technical knowledge and skills to operate computer numerically controlled (CNC) machine tools, such as lathes, mills, precision measuring tools, and related attachments and accessories, to perform machining functions, such as cutting, drilling, shaping, and finishing products and component parts.

" program that prepares individuals to apply technical knowledge and skills to further process ferrous and/or non-ferrous metal plates or shapes, and to manufacture and/or install products as interpreted through technical drawings."
This study deals with issues of fire control.

Careers and opportunities in medicine, health and veterinary medicine
". It is a 7 years programme that provides hands-on, practical experience in simulated settings and in the real world of clinical and biomedical practice. "
The Bachelor of Dental Science degree focuses on developing skill and expertise in diagnosing, treating and preventing diseases of the teeth, mouth tissue and supporting bones of the mouth.

"It is 4-year programme that combines theory in basic and applied biomedical science, and practical clinical skills in medicine, pediatrics, reproductive medicine and surgery in accredited hospitals. "
It is a 4-year programme that prepares students to work as registered nurses and midwifes.
Pharmacists are experts on the action and use of drugs, including their chemistry, formulation into medicines, and how they are used to manage diseases.

Bachelor of Public health aids students with the skills, knowledge, and abilities to excel in the sector. Moreover, it enables public health aspirants to improve the quality of life and health in their communities. "

"A program that focuses on the application of environmental sciences, public health, the biomedical sciences, and environmental toxicology to the study of environmental factors affecting human health, safety, and related ecological issues, and prepares individuals to function as professional environmental health specialists. "
Use health promotion, treatment, rehabilitation, and exercise to prevent disability and restore patients’ normal movement and physical function. "

The Bachelor of Science in the field of Occupational Therapy degree aims to skill students in helping clients who are temporarily or permanently impaired by illness, accident, disability, environmental limitations or developmental delay.

Students who apply for the Bachelor of Health Sciences in the field of Biomedical Sciences will enter an exciting and dynamic area that is highly relevant to the understanding and treatment of human diseases.

Professionals in health informatics provide medical insurance providers, healthcare providers, government agencies, and public health organizations with meaningful information designed to reduce healthcare costs and improve the health of patients and populations.
The Bachelor’s degree in Veterinary Medicine is the main programme offered by the school of Veterinary Medicine at The University of Zambia. "
